briefdescription.para: Standardized enumeration of handedness
Cached value of are we in the Editor for later use on shutdown
The internal handle attached to this instance of MLInput
The two controller objects currently being tracked. [0] = Left [1] = Right
The current pressed state of the controller triggers.
The input configuration to send to MLInputCreate
The configuration for the controllers.
Stored a cached list of the device controllers.
The unofficial maximum amount of tablets allowed to be conected to the device at once.

List of currently connected Tablet Devices. Will be empty if no Tablets are connected. Currently Unity is officially supporting one tablet connected, this setup will support more in the future when an official Maximum Supported Tablets is set.

The threshold used to determine when the trigger has been squeezed enough to be considered pressed. The trigger will remain in the pressed state until its reading goes below TriggerUpThreshold. TriggerDownThreshold must be larger than TriggerUpThreshold.

The threshold used to determine when the trigger has been released enough to be considered released. The trigger will remain in the released state until its reading goes above TriggerDownThreshold. TriggerUpThreshold must be smaller than TriggerDownThreshold.
This callback will be invoked whenever a detected touchpad gesture begins.
This callback will be invoked as a detected touchpad gesture continues.
This callback will be invoked whenever a detected touchpad gesture ends.
This callback will be invoked whenever a button press is detected.
This callback will be invoked whenever a button release is detected.
This callback will be invoked when a controller is connected.
This callback will be invoked when a controller is disconnected.
This callback will be invoked as the trigger passes the TriggerDownThreshold.
This callback will be invoked as the trigger passes the TriggerUpThreshold.
This callback will be invoked whenever a pen touch event is detected.
This callback will be invoked whenever a touch ring event is detected.

detaileddescription.para: touchRingValue for Wacom has 72 levels and goes from 0 to 71. Values are absolute, not relative to start position.

briefdescription.para: This callback will be invoked whenever a tablet device button press is detected.
This callback will be invoked whenever a tablet device button release is detected.
This callback will be invoked whenever a tablet device is connected.
This callback will be invoked whenever a tablet device is disconnected. This tabletID is no longer valid.
Gets a reference to a Controller object via hand mapping

simplesect.para: The first MLInputController mapped to the specified hand.

briefdescription.para: Gets a reference to a Controller object via index

simplesect.para: MLInputController corresponding to the specified index.

briefdescription.para: Maps a controller reference to a specific hand
Retrieves a controller index mapped to a specific hand

simplesect.para: Index of the first controller mapped to the specified hand.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the hand mapped to the specified controller index

simplesect.para: The hand mapped to the specified controller.

briefdescription.para: Starts the Input API.

parameterdescription.para: The configuration applied to input upon initialization.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.

briefdescription.para: Gets a reference to a Controller object via hand mapping

simplesect.para: The first MLInputController mapped to the specified hand.

briefdescription.para: Gets a reference to a Controller object via index

simplesect.para: MLInputController corresponding to the specified index.

briefdescription.para: Maps a controller reference to a specific hand
Retrieves a controller index mapped to a specific hand

simplesect.para: Index of controller mapped to the specified hand.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the hand mapped to the specified controller index

simplesect.para: Hand corresponding to the specified index.

briefdescription.para: List of MLTabletStates since last query up to a max of 20 MLTabletStates as specified in the CAPI. Will be empty if device has just been connected and no updates have happened yet or if a Tablet Pen is not activly touching or hovering above the touchpad.

parameterdescription.para: The Id of the tablet you want to get the states for. Can be retrieved from TabletDevices.
Returns the list of MLTabletStates since previous update for specific Tablet Device. Null for invalid tabletID or error on getting states.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successfully fetched the tablet device state.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.

briefdescription.para: Callback which is fired whenever the state of a button changes.

parameterdescription.para: The zero-based index of the controller.
The touchpad gesture attached to this event.

briefdescription.para: Callback which is fired whenever the state of a button changes.

parameterdescription.para: The zero-based index of the controller.
The button attached to this event.

briefdescription.para: Callback which is fired whenever the state of the controller connection changes.

parameterdescription.para: The zero-based index of the controller.

briefdescription.para: Callback which is fired whenever the state of the trigger changes.

parameterdescription.para: The zero-based index of the controller.
The current amount of depression of the trigger from 0 to 1.

briefdescription.para: Callback which is fired for pen touch events.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the tablet device.
State of the tablet device

briefdescription.para: Callback which is fired for touch ring events.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the tablet device.
Touch ring value. (0 - 71)
Time at which this event occured.

briefdescription.para: Callback which is fired for tablet button events.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the tablet device.
Value of the tablet device button.
Time at which this event occured.

briefdescription.para: Callback which is fired whenever the state of the tablet connection changes.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the tablet device.

briefdescription.para: Cleans up this input tracker and unsubscribes from the MagicLeap device's update loop.

parameterdescription.para: Whether it is safe for the cleanup routine to access managed objects.

briefdescription.para: Stores the current input information and sends input events.
